title: Understanding File Types
text: The question refers to a type of file you might receive in a static format. What distinguishes a flat file from other types?

title: Computational Characteristics of Flat Files
text: Flat files are considered to be simple and often used for the storage of data without modern database capabilities. They lack inherent relationships between tables.

title: Flat File Explanation
text: A flat file is essentially a single file where all data is stored in a tabular format or plain text. It typically lacks a structural relationship between data elements.

title: Recognizing the Answer
text: From the multiple-choice options: query, flat file, Excel file - which is a simple file that often stands alone, not part of a live dataset?
